short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Place your tabs in a convenient list to reduce tab clutter and memory usage

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tab Away lets you store tabs in a convenient list to reduce tab clutter and memory usage.

Tab Away also has a auto close feature where it can automatically add tabs to the list after a certain time which can be configured in the options.
